definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: early rain, which falls in Palestine from the last of October until the first of December, opp. [[מַלְקוֹשׁ]]: De 11:14, Je 5:24, Ho 6:3 (where MT makes ´[[יו]] Pt., or Hiph. Impf., but v. We); cf. also I. [[מוֹרֶה]]. Vid. further Rob:Br i, 429 f. Chaplin:PEF 1883, 8 ff. Klein:ZPV iv, 72 f.
